question: The ratio of volume of <katex>$Al^{27}$</katex> nucleus to its surface area is (Given <katex>$R_{0}=1.2 \times 10^{-15} \text{ m}$</katex>)
explanation: Radius <katex>$R = R_0 A^{1/3}$</katex>. For Al-27, <katex>$R = 1.2 \times 10^{-15} \times (27)^{1/3} = 1.2 \times 3 \times 10^{-15} = 3.6 \times 10^{-15} \text{ m}$</katex>.
